ErrorMessage.minmaxPassword: Password must be between 6 and 100 characters

HomePage.title: Home page
HomePage.description: Craving a classic American diner experience? Look no further than Big Boy! Savor our iconic Big Boy burger, juicy and flavorful, paired with creamy milkshakes and crispy fries. Perfect for families and friends!

Login.title: Login
Login.cardDescription: Enter your email and password to log in to the system

LoginGuest.title: Login to order
LoginGuest.description: Enter login information to place an order

logoutDialog.logoutQuestion: Are you sure you want to log out?
logoutDialog.logoutConfirm: Signing out may result in loss of your orders

Reviews.title: Customer Reviews
Reviews.description: Read what our customers say about their dining experience

QRCodes.title: QR Codes - Table List
QRCodes.description: Scan QR code to order from your table
